38a4(mdo sde): la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bsam pa ni dge ba'i chos rnams la dad pa dang 'dun pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyor ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa
38a5(mdo sde): rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sbyor ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das
38a6(mdo sde): kyis brjod pa mthar phyin par rig nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa thogs
38a7(mdo sde): pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kun nas mngon du gyur pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba
38b1(mdo sde): la mi 'jigs pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' yas pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
38b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kun du gzigs pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi grags pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyer med cing mi gnas pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
38b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sku thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba gang yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rnams gang yin/ sangs
38b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
38b5(mdo sde): dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthong bar dka' ba rig par dka' ba ste/ brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa mos par dka' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can de dag chos kyi rnam grangs
38b6(mdo sde): 'di thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dmus long la mar me mi gzugs kyi/ mig dang ldan pa rnams la mar me gzugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
38b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri'o/ /gang dag bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas dang / dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas
39a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri'o/ /gang dag mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa don yod pa de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri yis ston cig /kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos
39a2(mdo sde): pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi smras/ kye rgyal ba'i sras skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i
39a3(mdo sde): phyir ston cig / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal de la ston pa thogs pa med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams so
39a4(mdo sde): so'i gling re rer yang gser gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba'i lha dang mi rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs
39a5(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu
39a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyal po nyi zla mar me'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po nyi zla mar me'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
39a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med
39b1(mdo sde): do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ze ba can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ze ba can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor
39b2(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu ston
39b3(mdo sde): pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi
39b4(mdo sde): kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po
39b5(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i
39b6(mdo sde): rgyal po pad ma ral gri kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pad ma ral gri kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bai dUr+ya'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin
39b7(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po an da rnyil gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin
40a1(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po'i kha dog gis
40a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dpal
40a3(mdo sde): gyi snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
40a4(mdo sde): po ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig dkar po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams
40a5(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig dkar po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig mthon ka'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig mthon ka'i kha
40a6(mdo sde): dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig nam
40a7(mdo sde): mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig nam mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog
40b1(mdo sde): gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i
40b2(mdo sde): kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha
40b3(mdo sde): dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba
40b4(mdo sde): rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
40b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs
40b6(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
40b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
41a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag pa'i rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba
41a2(mdo sde): rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de
41a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs
41a4(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs
41a5(mdo sde): pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
41a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul
41a7(mdo sde): ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
41b1(mdo sde): med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten
41b2(mdo sde): gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po
41b3(mdo sde): che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin
41b4(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /
41b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /
41b6(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa
41b7(mdo sde): la thogs pa med do/ /nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i
42a1(mdo sde): kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya la dngos po'i dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che
42a2(mdo sde): bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems
42a3(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzad pa 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
42a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa'o/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re dang /
42a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'jug pa rnams la mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bsod nams kyi
42a6(mdo sde): tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa
42a7(mdo sde): med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
42b1(mdo sde): bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing
42b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la
42b3(mdo sde): thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi mngon
42b4(mdo sde): par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med
42b5(mdo sde): do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa
42b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen
42b7(mdo sde): pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams
43a1(mdo sde): cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zhing thams cad la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa
43a2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen
43a3(mdo sde): pa la thogs pa med do/ /de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i
43a4(mdo sde): phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ brag phug gi nang nas brag cha sems can gyi sgra rnam pa mang po 'jug pas sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan dag mtha' yas pa 'byung ste brag cha ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog
43a5(mdo sde): cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yang sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis de lta bu'i skad du ston pa 'byung bar shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par
43a6(mdo sde): mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par
43a7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams
43b1(mdo sde): re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
43b2(mdo sde): pa'i mdzod spu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur
43b3(mdo sde): pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan re rer yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med
43b4(mdo sde): pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
43b5(mdo sde): khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i
43b6(mdo sde): bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i
43b7(mdo sde): mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam
44a1(mdo sde): mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni smon
44a2(mdo sde): lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /
44a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab re re la ste/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi phyogs re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
44a4(mdo sde): 'khod pa ni rab tu mang gi / 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa dag gi rdul phra rab ni ches nyung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / gling dang / ri rab dang / ri rab
44a5(mdo sde): chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran dag gang la yang gnod pa dang sgrib pa med de/ sngon
44a6(mdo sde): ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du bya ba dag 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
44a7(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di ltar kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnya' shing gang tsam na bzhugs par mngon du mthong ngo / /
44b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun na 'dug
44b2(mdo sde): par mthong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
44b3(mdo sde): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems can bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi
44b4(mdo sde): rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal
44b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
44b6(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
44b7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye
45a1(mdo sde): shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes
45a2(mdo sde): kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye
45a3(mdo sde): shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
45a4(mdo sde): rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye
45a5(mdo sde): shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' las 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
45a6(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyis bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
45a7(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
45b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
45b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la la ni mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
45b3(mdo sde): gnas gang nas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin
45b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re la ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
45b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brgya stong grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
45b6(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig
45b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la
46a1(mdo sde): lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems
46a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang
46a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med
46a4(mdo sde): pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
46a5(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta
46a6(mdo sde): ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'
46a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /
46b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
46b2(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches
46b3(mdo sde): mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan
46b4(mdo sde): dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
46b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi
46b6(mdo sde): khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes
46b7(mdo sde): kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
47a1(mdo sde): ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin
47a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
47a3(mdo sde): sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
47a4(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
47a5(mdo sde): pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge
47a6(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
47a7(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i
47b1(mdo sde): stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i
47b2(mdo sde): ' khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan
47b3(mdo sde): mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan
47b4(mdo sde): dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
47b5(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin
47b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du sbyar te/ rten pa rnams dang / ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang / spyod pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams dang / dbugs
47b7(mdo sde): 'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang / tshul khrims rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / sems can gyi
48a1(mdo sde): bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rnams dang / bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang / dus gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang / mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / ye
48a2(mdo sde): shes dbyer med pa rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos rnams dang / snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang /
48a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / yongs su dag pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang / so sor rtogs pa rnams dang / stobs bskyed pa rnams dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi
48a4(mdo sde): tshul gyi lam rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'chad pa rnams dang / kun tu bzung ba rnams dang / spobs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang / gnas med pa rnams dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams dang /
48a5(mdo sde): sprul pa rnams dang / byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang / zab mo la 'jug pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la rten pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang /
48a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa rnams dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / ltem po ngag la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams
48a7(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang / rin po che bkod pa rnams dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams dang /
48b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang / rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po'i go cha rnams dang / rtsom pa chen po rnams dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams
48b2(mdo sde): dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang / ye shes khong du chud pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang dbung med pa rnams dang / gter rnams dang / sdom pa rnams dang / dbang
48b3(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / chos rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa rnams
48b4(mdo sde): dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rnam par rol pa rnams dang / yul rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / lus rnams dang /
48b5(mdo sde): lus kyi las rnams dang / gzugs rnams dang / ngag gi las rnams dang / sems rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / sems rgyas par byed pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / bsam pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang / sbyor ba rnams
48b6(mdo sde): dang / mos pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / bag chags rnams dang / len pa rnams dang / nan tan rnams dang / 'grub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges pa rnams dang / theg pa rnams dang / mi
48b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang / lam rnams dang / lam gyi tshad rnams dang / lam gyi tshogs rnams dang / lam sgom pa rnams
49a1(mdo sde): dang / lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil
49a2(mdo sde): 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi snod chus gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du snang ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag
49a3(mdo sde): kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re rer sems can bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis cig car mthong ste/ de bzhin
49a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sku thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mdor
49a5(mdo sde): bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so// //bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu mkhas pa gang
49a6(mdo sde): dag dpe bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gyur pa/ pad ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la skyes bu la la zhig gis
49a7(mdo sde): lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsib ma stong yod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi mgyogs pa bas kyang lhag pa'i rta de lta bur mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/ de ltar mgyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas phang lo la'ang chus mi reg /rta'i rmig pas kyang pad ma'i 'dab ma mi rdol ba de lta bu'i
49b1(mdo sde): shing rta des drangs pa las mtsho chen po de nas sbrul gdug pa steng du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shing rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la sbrul gdug pa des shing rta de lan bcur bskor te/ 'jam dpal skad cig gang gis sbrul gdug pas shing rta de lan cig bskor ba'i skad cig de la dge slong
49b2(mdo sde): kun dga' bos chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa bshad de don kyang rig par byed do/ /dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la dge slong shA ri'i bus chos rnam pa stong bstan pa bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do/ /dge slong shA ri'i
49b3(mdo sde): bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o/ /gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus skad cig gang la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas
49b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi gling re rer dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon
49b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang / chos gnas pa dang / chos nub pa dus gcig tu ston to/ /mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus gcig tu snang
49b6(mdo sde): ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dang mi rten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che bai dUr+ya las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/
49b7(mdo sde): bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang 'thun pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las
50a1(mdo sde): kyang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du dus gcig tu skad cig skad cig la mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/
50a2(mdo sde): de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams
50a3(mdo sde): cad du cig car du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ji lta ba dang / ji
50a4(mdo sde): ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dga' ldan gnas nas g.yos pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du mdzad pa rtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo
50a5(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed rab 'bring tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'du byed ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on
50a6(mdo sde): kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring
50a7(mdo sde): dang / rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin las ro gcig pa'i char
50b1(mdo sde): 'bab ste/ bab nas snod kyi bye brag gis kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su gyur te/ sprin ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal
50b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi
50b3(mdo sde): rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /
50b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nyi ma'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nor bu'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
50b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo / /der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi khom par skye ba rnams mi
50b6(mdo sde): 'byung ngo / /der sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /der 'khrug pa thams cad
50b7(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / /der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu dang / 'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi
51a1(mdo sde): rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin
51a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs
51a3(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang / rnam par gnas pa dang 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med
51a4(mdo sde): pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad
51a5(mdo sde): la sbyor ba dag 'byung ba ni ches mang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
51a6(mdo sde): rab 'byam thams cad na mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres
51a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sa la rten/ sa la gnas nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ sa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/
51b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi mu
51b2(mdo sde): stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa yangs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
51b3(mdo sde): ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dag zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman la reg pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te/
51b4(mdo sde): zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa'am/ glegs
51b5(mdo sde): bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyu des de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi zug rngu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog
51b6(mdo sde): cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog /rnam
51b7(mdo sde): par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa gang 'dod
52a1(mdo sde): pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa
52a2(mdo sde): de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni
52a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re

53a1(mdo sde): cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par

53b1(mdo sde): ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad
53b2(mdo sde): cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'das pa dang /
53b3(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig cing chags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53b4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems
53b5(mdo sde): can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ de bzhin du gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigs so/ /
53b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba
53b7(mdo sde): dag dus gcig tu gzigs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni 'jam
54a1(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing sems
54a2(mdo sde): kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can
54a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul
54a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med
54a5(mdo sde): pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob po/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
54a6(mdo sde): phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa ni 'jam dpal de
54a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tha dad la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la gling gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dad la khyim gzhan du gnas pa ma yin
54b1(mdo sde): no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ris 'di na tha dad la lha'i ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba 'di na tha dad la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kyi 'gro ba
54b2(mdo sde): 'di na tha dad la kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la gzugs kyi khams su
54b3(mdo sde): gnas pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med
54b4(mdo sde): pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang / 'jig par snang ba'i rgyal ba'i gtsug
54b5(mdo sde): tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ /de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ de bzhin du rgyal ba'i mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams
54b6(mdo sde): na mi rnyed do/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bus 'dul ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor las
54b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag
55a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
55a2(mdo sde): bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni mngon par shes
55a3(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis
55a4(mdo sde): ni dbugs 'byin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
55a5(mdo sde): med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag

55a7(mdo sde): gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas
55b1(mdo sde): dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de
55b2(mdo sde): bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas
55b3(mdo sde): par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul
55b4(mdo sde): yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu dang /
55b5(mdo sde): nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa'
55b6(mdo sde): kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo / /'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/ /byang chub sems
55b7(mdo sde): dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo / /
56a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gling thams cad na dus gcig tu
56a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyis 'gyur du mthong ngo / /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa 'dor bas steng gi phyogs
56a3(mdo sde): logs su song ste/ gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang der yang de bzhin gshegs pa

56a7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa'i gnas ji snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo / /sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang /
56b1(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa
56b2(mdo sde): rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam

58a1(mdo sde): pas rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la/ sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs

58a3(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge

58a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang

58a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi
58b1(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

58b6(mdo sde): ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /
58b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i
59a1(mdo sde): gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi
59a2(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa
59a3(mdo sde): bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
59a4(mdo sde): bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi

59a6(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la nyin bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig
59a7(mdo sde): zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i

59b2(mdo sde): na/ thal mo sbyor ba'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang
59b3(mdo sde): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
59b4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod

60a1(mdo sde): shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi

60b5(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
60b6(mdo sde): mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed
60b7(mdo sde): de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba dang / rnyogs par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa bskyed de spyos na/ de mi dge
61a1(mdo sde): ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/ de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par
61a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ lce re re la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis
61a3(mdo sde): bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khros pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs
61a4(mdo sde): med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re na dgra
61a5(mdo sde): bcom pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
61a6(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rkyen cis kyang rung / khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na/
61a7(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa
61b1(mdo sde): des chos spangs pa yin no/ /chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
61b2(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun gnag dag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o zhes zer na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig
61b3(mdo sde): pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/ 'di
61b4(mdo sde): ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang che bas ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du
61b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge
61b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems

62a1(mdo sde): thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang /
62a2(mdo sde): klog tu 'jug pa dang / tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam
62a3(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du
62a4(mdo sde): med pa grangs med pa rnams dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gsan pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di

62b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
62b2(mdo sde): la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la/ chos
