62b6(mdo sde): 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / su skye bar
62b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med/ brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las bskal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong
63a1(mdo sde): ste/ 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong yang mi gdug
63a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
63a3(mdo sde): ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha dang /
63a4(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
63a5(mdo sde): po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
63a6(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
63a7(mdo sde): khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob
63b1(mdo sde): dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyi yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin
63b2(mdo sde): la gnas pa/ zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
63b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/ /
63b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag
63b5(mdo sde): rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag
63b6(mdo sde): yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba
63b7(mdo sde): lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no/ /'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla
64a1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes
64a2(mdo sde): kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni
64a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu
64a4(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub
64a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang /
64a6(mdo sde): bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing
64a7(mdo sde): rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag
64b1(mdo sde): tshad brgyad cur phyir ded de phul na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/
64b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyugs kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/
64b3(mdo sde): bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
64b4(mdo sde): du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed
64b5(mdo sde): cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag
64b6(mdo sde): kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i
64b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal dper na mi la
65a1(mdo sde): la zhig mig nad kyis mig zums par gyur nas/ de mig dbye ba dang gzums su rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ de'i dgra'am/ mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig
65a2(mdo sde): gis pi pi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin
65a3(mdo sde): cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas
65a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/
65a5(mdo sde): bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ de yang 'di snyam du spyod de/ ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi
65a6(mdo sde): de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi des
65a7(mdo sde): bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas
65b1(mdo sde): ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang
65b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos
65b3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par
65b4(mdo sde): gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su sbyong bar byed du 'jug na de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du
65b5(mdo sde): byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab
65b6(mdo sde): kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal dper na shing gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/ de yang rgya
65b7(mdo sde): mtsho chen pos khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las phyir phul te bzlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po
66a1(mdo sde): chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba 'am/ sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub
66a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/ thams
66a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal ji ltar
66a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched
66a5(mdo sde): che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma
66a6(mdo sde): chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo
66a7(mdo sde): thogs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa rgyud de'i lo dus ring mo zhig gis rngo thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
66b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen cing mi sten la/ bsnyen bkur mi byed nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba
66b2(mdo sde): 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ sems par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha
66b3(mdo sde): ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal dper na nam mkha'
66b4(mdo sde): lding gi dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bsam pa dang
66b5(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang tsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa yang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
66b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che
66b7(mdo sde): rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam na/ 'jam
67a1(mdo sde): dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de
67a2(mdo sde): bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos
67a3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ dpyod
67a4(mdo sde): cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston
67a5(mdo sde): cing de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par byed cing der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der bab la/ de dag dang lhan cig tu
67a6(mdo sde): gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed la/ de theg
67a7(mdo sde): pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga'
67b1(mdo sde): bas lung 'bogs par byed/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang gsong por smra la/ tshig mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub pa dang / dga' ba dang snyan par smra zhing / de srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong
67b2(mdo sde): la de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la ci nus ci lcogs kyis snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed
67b3(mdo sde): pa dang rtsod par mi byed la/ de sngon ma byung ba dang ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma
67b4(mdo sde): bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol zhing byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la slob pa 'di ni 'jam dpal
67b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten
67b6(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur
67b7(mdo sde): du 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas
68a1(mdo sde): gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te/ der yang bdag gis bgyi ba dang / bgyi ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che
68a2(mdo sde): ba dang / ched che rab cig mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du
68a3(mdo sde): sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa spyod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
68a4(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur
68a5(mdo sde): mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog
68a6(mdo sde): par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog /gang kha
68a7(mdo sde): ton byed pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na kha ton byed/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag la/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang lus dang / ngag dang /
68b1(mdo sde): yid yongs su dag pa la dgod/ tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos can la dgod/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang
68b2(mdo sde): bcas par byed la/ der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der bab cing de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug
68b3(mdo sde): lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ de theg pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod
68b4(mdo sde): par byed de/ theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug cing kha ton byed du 'jug /ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed la/ byang chub
68b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra la/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la dgod/ de tshig mi brlang / mi gtum/ mi rtsub la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la
68b6(mdo sde): dgod cing / de dga' ba dang snyan par smra la/ srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong zhing / de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa drag po dang /
68b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma byung ba dang /
69a1(mdo sde): ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing tshol ba dang / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs
69a2(mdo sde): pa rnams la yang rlom sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang / mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can
69a3(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag
69a4(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i
69a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
69a6(mdo sde): par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/
69a7(mdo sde): de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed
69b1(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
69b2(mdo sde): pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud
69b3(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang
69b4(mdo sde): bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i chos la 'dun
69b5(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag
69b6(mdo sde): kyang bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/
69b7(mdo sde): de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i sems
70a1(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
70a2(mdo sde): dag kyang yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams
70a3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub
70a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can
70a5(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
70a6(mdo sde): la/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang
70a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i
70b1(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
70b2(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bzod pa dang des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de zhi gnas dang
70b3(mdo sde): lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par
70b4(mdo sde): sdom pa dang / des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/
70b5(mdo sde): de dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
70b6(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la
70b7(mdo sde): 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i
71a1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos
71a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
71a3(mdo sde): la/ gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems
71a4(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de nges pa'i
71a5(mdo sde): don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos
71a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i chos dang / don dang / 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin
71a7(mdo sde): la/ gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang don dang / 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/ de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par
71b1(mdo sde): byed/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mgon med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gling med pa/ sems can 'di
71b2(mdo sde): dag ni gnas med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/ kye ma nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/ skyabs su 'gyur zhig gu/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu/ gling du 'gyur zhig gu/ gnas su 'gyur
71b3(mdo sde): zhig gu/ skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o/ /'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding lang tsho dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa de ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
71b4(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / mgyogs pa dang / shugs dang / rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang skye bar 'gyur la/ ngan song ngan
71b5(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling dang / gnas dang / skyob par yang 'gyur ba de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam
71b6(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing / lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te de bzhin gshegs
71b7(mdo sde): pa re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
72a1(mdo sde): ni sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi
72a2(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal
72a3(mdo sde): gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems
72a4(mdo sde): can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can
72a5(mdo sde): thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
72a6(mdo sde): la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag na/ 'di
72a7(mdo sde): ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la rigs kyi
72b1(mdo sde): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
72b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems
72b3(mdo sde): la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad glang po
72b4(mdo sde): che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
72b5(mdo sde): skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/
72b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/
72b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can
73a1(mdo sde): gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
73a2(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen dad pa
73a3(mdo sde): can gsum la skyabs su song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
73a4(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i
73a5(mdo sde): zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med
73a6(mdo sde): par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zag brgyad pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de
73a7(mdo sde): ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs
73b1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye
73b2(mdo sde): ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
73b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
73b4(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
73b5(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin
73b6(mdo sde): na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa
73b7(mdo sde): byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
74a1(mdo sde): skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin
74a2(mdo sde): te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i
74a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe gang dang gang las brtsams te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe des sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci yang med la/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de
74a4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la ping ka sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing mig ma bye ba dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par
74a5(mdo sde): byed do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab rib kyi bris yog pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang
74a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig
74a7(mdo sde): bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig
74b1(mdo sde): zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems
74b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems
74b3(mdo sde): dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta
74b4(mdo sde): bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro
74b5(mdo sde): ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
74b6(mdo sde): kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
74b7(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs
75a1(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar
75a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
75a3(mdo sde): mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron
75a4(mdo sde): mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/
75a5(mdo sde): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/ me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu Sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ra ni bar na dang / go ta ra ni dang / dri
75a6(mdo sde): mchog dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang
75a7(mdo sde): byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam/ ri mor bris pa mthong
75b1(mdo sde): ngam/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /gang mar me'am/ bdug pa'am/ me tog gam/ spos
75b2(mdo sde): 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ tha na de'i yon tan bsngags pa gcig tsam brjod na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /longs spyod chen por 'grub par byed cing mthar gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal dper na chu'i thigs pa chung
75b3(mdo sde): ngu rgya mtsho chen por song ba yang sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor
75b4(mdo sde): yongs su zad pa'am/ mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang / 'di lta ste/ bong dang / khyon dang / che bas skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'dug cing kun du lhang nger 'dug go /
75b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba yang 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'dug go/ /'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
75b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub
75b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig
76a1(mdo sde): gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ ston par byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
76a2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi zas dang gos bcad la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
76a3(mdo sde): ni khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i zan cig phrogs sam/ zan cig gcod du bcug na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
76a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi
76a5(mdo sde): rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la kham gcig tsam yongs su btang ba yang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam
76a6(mdo sde): dpal nan gyis dper bya na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
76a7(mdo sde): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med par byas
76b1(mdo sde): na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
76b2(mdo sde): shes mthong ba'i phung po ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung
76b3(mdo sde): po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am
76b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la khros te gnod sems kyi
76b5(mdo sde): sems kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig
76b6(mdo sde): phyung la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal nan gyis dper bya na gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
76b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/ de nas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa'i sems kyis mig bskyed la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
77a1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems kyis bltas na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar 'dug pa las btson
77a2(mdo sde): ra nas thar bar byas nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis mthong bar 'dod cing / dga' ba'i sems kyis de'i bsngags pa brjod na/
77a3(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa
77a4(mdo sde): chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig tsam 'phel bar byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
77a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phung po med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don du bcug na 'di
77a6(mdo sde): ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal nan gyis dper bya na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
77a7(mdo sde): 'gro dang rnams su skyes par byas la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am
77b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni tha na theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig theg
77b2(mdo sde): pa chen po la mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes
77b3(mdo sde): par gyur la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton nas byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni sems can
77b4(mdo sde): gcig theg pa chen po la mos pa la 'jug par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams
77b5(mdo sde): par byas la/ gcig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi
77b6(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de dag gi grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa bsgrags la/ rigs kyi
77b7(mdo sde): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing bsngags pa ma yin pa bsgrags na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa
78a1(mdo sde): skyed do/ /'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis tha na chu ra'i chu tsam byin na yang las des de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma myong bar gyur na/
78a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa la mos pa la lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
78a3(mdo sde): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgyal 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang /
78a4(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma mu drA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ /bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
78a5(mdo sde): mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong thams pa'i dge slong
78a6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
78a7(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na legs par gsungs pa'i chos
78b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba la dge slong rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma
78b2(mdo sde): thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyis de lta ma yin par
78b3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/ /shA
78b4(mdo sde): ri'i bu gzhan yang brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/ de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung
78b5(mdo sde): ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i
78b6(mdo sde): bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
78b7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na/ dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa

79a2(mdo sde): bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes de skad bka' stsal/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor so so'i skye
79a3(mdo sde): bo'i chos rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems can gyi khams ni nang na yang mi dmigs/
79a4(mdo sde): phyi rol na yang mi dmigs/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te/ sems can gyi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis
79a5(mdo sde): 'di skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/
79a6(mdo sde): de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas
79a7(mdo sde): dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes gang gsungs pa de yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang dag gi rten tam/ gnas med pa de dag ni ji ltar thob par rung / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te zag pa med pa'i
79b1(mdo sde): chos rnams thob tu rung na ni dmigs pa las dgra bcom pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni ltos pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas 'di
79b2(mdo sde): skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu

80a1(mdo sde): kyis chos nyid las dgongs nas 'di skad du/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed ces bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa
80a2(mdo sde): rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings ni nang na yang mi dmigs/ phyi rol na yang mi dmigs/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/ /nang gdags pa ni gdags su med pa dang skye ba med pa'i gdags pa'o/ /de ltar na sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi
80a3(mdo sde): dbyings mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar na sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gang la gnyis su med pa de gnyis su byar med pa de la ni gsal ba

80b1(mdo sde): dge slong gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba las bstan par mi nus la/ de la ni 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'greng ba yang med/ 'dug pa yang med/ nyal ba yang med do/ /rtog pa can ma yin pa'i dge slong ni brtags pa la longs spyod pa'o/ /rtog pa can gyi dge

80b5(mdo sde): pa bzhin du ngas de las dgongs nas bstan pa yin te/ 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu phyag rgya 'dis mngon pa'i nga rgyal can brtag par 'dod pas ni phyag rgya de'i mdun du brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu shin tu brtags pa ni
80b6(mdo sde): phyag rgya 'dis ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can mang po brtag par nus so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srid pa tha ma pa'i dge slong brgya ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma zhugs shing ma rtogs la
80b7(mdo sde): ma mos nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /dge slong lnga ni spong ba byas shing bzlog pa byas nas rang gi lus dang bcas te sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ngas kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no snyam ste/
81a1(mdo sde): de la dgongs nas de skad bstan mod kyi 'on kyang gang dang yang mi 'thun pa med de/ shA ri'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du skye bo phal po che'i mdun du khyed la ngas chos bshad par bya'o/ /chos de yang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no
81a2(mdo sde): zhes tshig tu smra na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos de dang mi 'thun pa gang dag yin pa'i mi de dag yod pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nga yang kye ma chos
81a3(mdo sde): 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no zhes de skad du yang ston la de 'jig rten de yang yang dag par ma mthong ngo / /'jig rten med pa la ni chos kyang bgrang du med do/ /'jig rten gdags pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa zhes bya ba ni chos
81a4(mdo sde): rnams ma 'dres shing chos rnams 'dre ba med pa la bya bar gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'dres pa zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ro gcig par gdags pa yin te/ gcig pu
81a5(mdo sde): kho na yang ma yin/ tha dad pa kho na yang ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni
81a6(mdo sde): gdags su med pa'o/ /gang gdags su med pa de ni gdags par mi nus so/ /gang gdags par mi nus pa de ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gang 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang
81a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa de ni stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
81b1(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //lots+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang po dang / lha'i zla bas bsgyur cing
81b2(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra dI pa dA nI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
81b3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/
81b4(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dpag tu med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni legs par yongs su sbyangs pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa/ rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa/ snang ba dpag tu med pa/ bsod nams la yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa/ gzugs dpag tu med pa/ bde ba la
81b5(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa dag ste/ de dag ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa dang / len pa
81b6(mdo sde): med par zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dag go/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas bsam gtan par gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes
81b7(mdo sde): pas shes rab dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab yangs pa dang ldan pa/ nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dang ldan pa/ grangs med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ rnam par nges pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ rnam par nges
82a1(mdo sde): pa gzigs pa/ mchog tu rnam par grol zhing shin tu rnam par grol ba'i thugs dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ 'khrug pa med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ 'phrin las legs par mdzad pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang / shA ri'i bu de
82a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ yid la mdzad pa dang ma bral ba/ bden pa ston pa/ bden pa gzigs pa/ snang
82a3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshogs dpag tu med pa/ zil gyis gnon pa/ zil gyis mi gnon pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ stobs
82a4(mdo sde): bcu'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ sngon gyi bsam
82a5(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon yongs su sbyong ba mdzad pa/ shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/ brtson pa ma bor ba/ brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/ mya ngan dang gnod pa dang bral ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba/ thams cad gzigs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/
82a6(mdo sde): glang po chen po/ dpag tu med pa/ phung po mi mnga' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa dang / shA ri'i bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa/
82a7(mdo sde): rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma sems dang ba/ bsod nams don du gnyer ba/ bsod nams la dmigs pa/ bsod nams yo byad du
82b1(mdo sde): byed pa/ bsod nams 'dod pa/ rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas tha na mar me'i snying po chung ngu'am ngan pa zhig 'bru mar gyis bskus sam mar gyis bskus te 'bul lam/ nges par 'bul lam/ yongs su
82b2(mdo sde): 'bul lam/ 'jog par byed pa dang / dge ba don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha'i skye ba'i 'khor ba spangs pa/ de ltar byung ba na tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
82b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pas bzung ba nyid yid la byed dam/ de las yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig yid la byed dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir dang gzhi de las de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
82b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar sems bskyed de/ mar me 'di 'bar bar bya/ rab tu 'bar bar bya/ dbul bar bya/ yongs su dbul bar bya/ rab tu gzhag par bya'o snyam pa'am/ sems kyi rgyud dad par gyur
82b5(mdo sde): pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa bsod nams mang po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byed de/
82b6(mdo sde): de tsam mam/ tsam mam/ chung ngu zhig gam/ dan ngon tsam zhig gam/ gsog tsam zhig gam/ tha na glog gi rgyun tsam zhig kyang snang bar byed dam/ tha na them skas kyi gzhi gcig snang bar byed na yang shA ri'i bu de'i rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos rnams kyis sam/
82b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang lan la ni mi re zhing dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / dang bas yongs su btang ba'i rnam par smin pa bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ston par spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
83a1(mdo sde): dad pa dang ldan pa gus par gnas shing g.yo med la sgyu med pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i bsam pa skyes nas mar me tsam mam/ chung ngu tsam zhig kyang snang bar byas te mar me snang bar byas
83a2(mdo sde): pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de'i tha na them skas tsam snang ngam/ bskor sa tsam snang ngam/ smad dam/ gdugs sam/ thams cad snang ngam/ tha na bar skabs gang yang rung ba zhig snang ba'i mar me de mod la myur du shi ste/ rlung gis bskyod pas sam/ char
83a3(mdo sde): pas sam/ mar zad pas sam/ snying po zad pas shi la/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na klus dkrugs pa na sprin stug po'i dra ba 'khrigs pa las nam mkha' las glog byung nas nub na/ shA ri'i bu myur du 'byung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba de mthong bas sems can rnams kyi mig
83a4(mdo sde): thibs zhes byed pa de tsam du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa sems can bslab pa'i gzhi ma blangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba don du gnyer ba/ sangs rgyas dang /
83a5(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ bdag nyid bskyab par bya ba la gnas pa/ bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis ji tsam du chung ba'i mar me phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas
83a6(mdo sde): mkhyen to/ /shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba cig phul bas mar me phul ba las mngon par grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i rnam par smin pa ni shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par lha dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang
83a7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus bstan par mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba des bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu
83b1(mdo sde): med grangs med pa yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i don de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ shA ri'i bu mar me de tsam du chung ngu phul ba'i rnam par smin pa yang dpag tu med na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
83b2(mdo sde): rten la mchod pa khyad par can byed dam byed du 'jug ste/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ gdugs sam/ ba dan rnams sam/ gang yang rung ba'i mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa mang pos mchod pa khyad par can byed dam byed du 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
83b3(mdo sde): chos 'di bzhi ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni dpag tu med do snyam du dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar chung ngu'i rnam par smin pa yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang / dkon mchog
83b4(mdo sde): gsum la dad pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ston pa mthong ba/ nyan thos khyed kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad du bsam pa'am/ yongs su bsam par mi nus na/ 'phags pa'i rigs la mi gnas pa gzhan rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa
83b5(mdo sde): mngon sum du shes pa'am/ khong du chud par nus pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /gzhan du na de ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang / shA ri'i bu nyan thos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam pa'am shes par mi nus te/ shA ri'i
83b6(mdo sde): bu khyed rnams gnas 'di la bsam pa dang bral bar gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
83b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so/ /shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi
84a1(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes ston par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu sems can gyi bsam pa dang / sems dang / lhag mthong yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas
84a2(mdo sde): pa khyed cag nyid kyang sems can thams cad kyi shes pa de la mig dang mkhas pa la shes pa mi 'jug na/ sems ma dul ba tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba/ brjed ngas pa/
84a3(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pas mig bsgribs pa gzhan gang dag bdag ci zhig /bdag su zhig /bdag ci 'dra ba zhig /bdag gang nas/ bdag ji tsam zhig /bdag ji lta bu zhig /bdag ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ bdag mi ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ bdag brjed ngas
84a4(mdo sde): pa'am/ bdag dran pa nye bar gnas pa'am/ bdag mkhas pa'i las byed pa'am/ bdag byis pa'i las byed pa'am/ bdag gang nas 'ongs/ bdag gang du 'gro zhes rang gi chos la shes pa 'jug pa yang med pa rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo ni
84a5(mdo sde): bdag la shes pa 'jug pa yang med na/ phyin ci log gi lta ba can de las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang bral ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba ma yin/ shes rab dang bral ba
84a6(mdo sde): ma yin/ rnam par grol ba dang bral ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba ma yin/ rig pa dang bral ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa'o/ /
84a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims chags pa med pa'o/ /tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /tshul khrims gzhal du med pa'o/ /tshul khrims rdzogs pa'o/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o/ /de la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /
84b1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su zad cing / mi dge ba'i chos
84b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis gang ba'o/ /sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o/ /sems can 'di ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o zhes shA ri'i bu 'jug
