190b2(mdo sde): nus shing / sa dang / ri rab dang / chu bo dang / rgya mtshor bcas te/ bskal pa mang por khur khyer nus kyang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe skye bo phal pas kyang dam pa'i chos ston mi nus/ de bzhin gshegs
190b3(mdo sde): pa'i snying po yang 'chad mi nus pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po sems can thams cad la phan par ston pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston cing / dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de ni shin tu dka' ba byed par bstan to/ /gzhan yang
190b4(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba la khyor ba'i chus zhi bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho'i chab kyis kyang me de zhi bar mi nus te/ khyor ba'i chab
190b5(mdo sde): kyis ni khyim rab tu 'bar ba la yang zhi bar mi nus na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po lta ga la nus/ bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs bri/ ngang tshul ngan pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i dus
190b6(mdo sde): na/ nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi srog kyang btang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa'i nor ngan pa rnam pa mang po yang byin nas
190b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa'i skyes bu dam pa de ci 'dra/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mi rig go/ /de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi chos rnam par dag pa yang bshad
191a1(mdo sde): dka' na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa lta ci smos/ de ltar skyes bu dam pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba khyor ba'i chus zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du der mchi
191a2(mdo sde): zhing / shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa de ni skyes bu de gzhan ma lags kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /ngas kyang tshig de skad smras so/ /skyes bu de shin tu
191a3(mdo sde): dka' ba byed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed du yon tan bshad kyang de'i mtha' mi rnyed do/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung por chu bo thams cad 'bab pa mi mngon pa de bzhin du skyes bu de'i blo'i nang du
191a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad kyi blo de'i nang du zhugs par mi snang ngo / /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can gyi ro thams cad mthar 'byin pa de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de yang mig zur yang mi lta/ khyim la chags pa yang med/ chos dang mi ldan pa
191a5(mdo sde): rnams dang rigs 'dres pa yang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la smod pa byed pa rnams kyang spangs te/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /gang de'i phyogs 'dzin cing nyan pa de dag kyang / nga'i nyan thos shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /
191a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsar yin
191a7(mdo sde): no/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ chos la sems pa dang / rtog cing gzhig pa dang / len cing 'dzin pa dang / pha ma la sri zhu che ba dang / rang gi slob dpon la byas pa gzo ba dang / lta ba thams cad dang mi 'thun pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la khyad du gsod cing 'dul
191b1(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa dang / mi rung ba thams cad spong ba dang / 'dod pa med pa'i sems 'di lta ste/ rmi lam na yang khu ba mi 'byung zhing tshul khrims la gus par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/ /yang mtshan nyid brgyad
191b2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ theg pa chen po ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal bar ston cing gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / zang zing la mi brkam pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
191b3(mdo sde): btang snyoms su ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang / de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chog shes pa ste/ mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan
191b4(mdo sde): na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/ /yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phan pa dang / ran pa dang / 'jam par smra ba dga' ba dang / nyon mongs pa chung ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /
191b5(mdo sde): mdo sde'i mtha' thams cad nyan pa la bzod pa dang / mig gnyid thul ba dang / snyom las med de ldang zhing bag yod pa dang / bslab pa la mos pa ste/ mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/ /yang mtshan nyid
191b6(mdo sde): brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bden pa dang gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra byed pa dang / mkhas pa dang / 'od dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / bud med dang 'grogs pa spong ba dang / gnyen gyi khyim nas
191b7(mdo sde): ring du lta ba dang / gtse ba de dang des sdig pa'i dge sbyong thams cad la 'jigs pa dang / thos ma thag tu lus kyi spu langs par 'gyur ba dang / srog chags thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba ste/ mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
192a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' gsar yin no/ /yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bdud kyis bshad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bye brag shes pa dang / mdo sde shes pa la bkur
192a2(mdo sde): sti byed pa dang / 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba ma yin pa'i bye brag shes te mi 'chab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa shes/ 'jig rten gyi phyir 'brang bar bya ba shes/ de bzhin
192a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rtag pa nyid du shes pa/ sdig pa dang / sdig pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la mkhas pa/ yul dang / dus dang / ye shes dang / bdag gi nus pa dang / rab tu shes pa ste/ mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
192a4(mdo sde): dpa' gsar yin no/ /mtshan nyid bzhi bcu po de dag dang ldan te/ lus dran pa'i chos dang ldan pa de gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' gsar zhes bya'o/ /gang la yon tan bzhi bcu med de phyed dam/ phyed kyi yang phyed yod pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag
192a5(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mor rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpar brtse bar mi gtogs so/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /de la yon tan gyi mchog gang zhe na/ g.yem pa'i 'du shes med cing
192a6(mdo sde): rmi lam na yang khu ba mi 'byung ba de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i mir rig par bya ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad kyi yon tan gyi mchog go/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin
192a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad pa de'i don ci/ gal te sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod na/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis srog gcod pa dang / smra ba dang / chang 'thung
192b1(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khrig pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad byar rung ngam/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la yod na gang gi tshe bsgral zhing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yod na/ thams cad
192b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang mtshams med pa dang / 'dod chen pa'i las bya bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sems can thams cad la bdag gi dbyings yod na/ bdag nyid sgrol bar 'gyur te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la bdag gi dbyings med pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten dang bdag la dbyings
192b3(mdo sde): med de/ thams cad la bdag med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/ nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs nas bum pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin du
192b4(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu gcig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de ring nas lo bdun na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
192b5(mdo sde): por 'gyur ro/ /nga yang zhag bdun na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lung bstan nas/ 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu de rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan te/ gdon mi za bar 'gyur snyam nas dga'
192b6(mdo sde): ches te/ rang gi ma la smras pa/ ma nya dang / sha dang / 'o ma dang / til gyi la du dang / zho dang / do ba dang / khu ba dang / 'bru drus pa dag stsol cig /stobs chen por bya'o zhes thams cad bsres te zos nas/ dus ma yin pa tsam gyis shi nas bdag nyid shi ba/ bdag
192b7(mdo sde): nyid kyis nyams par byas na/ ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ngam/ de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin/ 'on tam de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa med dam/ gsol pa/ de sngon las ngan pa
193a1(mdo sde): bgyis pas gum mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig /de ni dus ma yin pa tsam bab pa ste/ sngon las ngan pa byas pa ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lung ston pa na/ des sngon las
193a2(mdo sde): byas pa mi mkhyen par lung bstan re skan/ de ni sngon las ngan pa byas pas shi ba ma yin gyi/ bdag nyid kyis nyes te/ bdag gis bsad do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung ste/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bdag la yod pas
193a3(mdo sde): de nyid sgrol bar 'gyur gyis sdig pa bya'o snyam ste sdig pa byas na de ci bdag gi dbyings sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu ltar dbyings yod kyang mi sgrol lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid bag med pa mang ba dag bag med pa'i phyir chos
193a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyis mi sgrol lo/ /ci sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ni rgyal thabs kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la yod do/ /sangs rgyas gsung ba yin nam/ sangs rgyas ni
193a5(mdo sde): gsung ba ma yin te/ sems can smra ba rnams bag med par myos shing bstan pa thos nas kyang de dag rang gi nyes pas sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sngon bgyis pa'i las ma mchis zhes bgyi'am/ bka' stsal pa/
193a6(mdo sde): mdo sde las yod ces 'byung mod kyi/ thos pa tsam gyis grangs med pa'i yang grangs med par byas pa'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa mang po nas/ 'jig rten gyi phyir dam bcas te bdag
193a7(mdo sde): grol nas sems can thams cad dgrol lo/ /bdag brgal nas sems can thams cad bsgral lo zhes de ltar dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis las byas pa ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
193b1(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jam dpal sprin dang / khug rna dang / ba mo'i dri ma dang / nyes pa rnams ni ji tsam du nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du 'jig rten la sgrib kyi/ nyi ma shar ma thag tu se gol gtogs pa srid kyis zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sdig
193b2(mdo sde): p a'i phung po grangs med par byas pa yang mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du sems can thams cad 'khor ba bye bar kun du 'khor gyi mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma shar ma thag tu sdig pa'i phung po grangs med par byas pa yang se gol gtogs pa srid kyis zad par 'gyur
193b3(mdo sde): ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'phyas pa'am/ sting ba'am/ kha gcus pa'am/ gzhan gyi phyir 'brang ba'am/ 'di las phyi rol par gyur pa'am/ phas pham pa'am/ mtshams med pa byas par gyur pa/ grangs med par sdig pa byas pa de
193b4(mdo sde): yang thang cig tsam gyis zad par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems ma bskyed pa yang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyi bye
193b5(mdo sde): brag gis bdag dang 'jig rten gyi phyir bdag grol nas dgrol lo/ /'khor ba bye ba na gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can rnams dam pa'i chos bye bas sad par byas te/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/ byang chub sems dpar
193b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad pa'i phyir rings par bya'o/ /de las nga'i lus 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal ngas bshad pa/ ngas ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu bcad pa'i lam bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa yin gyis da khyed kyis
193b7(mdo sde): nan tan gyis shig ces ngas lam bstan to/ /lam bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/ /de la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /
194a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lam zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/ nga'i dbyings su ngas mi g.yo ba thob pa ltar/ bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyis/ nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad par bya'o/ /gal te
194a2(mdo sde): ma bcad na nges par 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'phyan to zhes mya ngan gyi zug rngu gcad pa'i lam ngas bstan to/ /mya ngan ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i don to/ /zug rngu 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig so/ /bdag gis nyon mongs pa
194a3(mdo sde): bye ba gzhom pa ni sman pa ltar skyug pa dang / bkru ba dang / brtol ba'i don byed pa ste/ khyed kyang rang bzhin gyis nga la bsnyen bkur gyis shig dang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /da khyed kyis nan tan gyis shig ces bya ba de ni dgongs
194a4(mdo sde): te gsungs pa'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa'o zhes bya ba yang skye ba 'di chod cig chod cig /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /dad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gser gyi gram bu bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
194a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mnyes par byed pa ni rus sbal zhar ba gnya' shing gi bu gar 'jug pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mdo sde 'di don med par ma byed cig /tshe dang 'tsho ba'i 'bras bu yod par gyis shig /bdag nyid srid
194a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las sgrol cig /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa ste/ bsod nams la g.yel bar byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga'o/ /ngas nyan thos kyi theg pa las bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
194a7(mdo sde): po ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /'jig rten na dpe med de de ltar shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /'jig rten na dpe med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la myur du ltos te/ de ltar gyis shig pa'i don to/ /sdig pa la yid mi dga' zhes bshad pa de'i don ci/ de'i
194b1(mdo sde): don bshad par bya'o/ /sems ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ dge slong rnams mi dge ba'i grogs po'i sten gyi nyes pas dri ma lnga la sogs pa dri ma mang pos mdun du byas shing bskor to/ /dri ma lnga la sogs pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dang / sred pa dang / gnod
194b2(mdo sde): sems mang ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang gsum ste/ rgod pa dang / the tsom de lnga ni sems sun 'byin pa'o/ /dri ma lnga la sogs te/ dri ma mang po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ /sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i dbang du
194b3(mdo sde): brtson par bya'o/ /rings par rings par zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du mdo sde spong bar ma gyur pa dang / ji tsam du 'dod chen par ma gyur pa de tsam du bdag nyid bsgral ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig /tshig de'i don ni 'di yin te/ sems bzhin du nyon mongs pa blo bur gyi
194b4(mdo sde): dri ma bye ba rtsa ba nas brko ba ni rings par rings par zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to/ /yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro/ /yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba yis/ /byed pa dang ni smra ba dag /de dag bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /grib ma bzhin du rjes
194b5(mdo sde): su 'gro/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa las yid ces bya ba bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i don te/ yid rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba de gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/ chos
194b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no/ /yang yid rab tu dang bas byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba thams cad bcad de bdag gi dbyings bstan nas gang rab tu dang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid do/ /de nas phyis smra ba dang
194b7(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thob nas gang smra ba dang / gang byed pa de thams cad 'jig rten rab tu sgrol ba ste/ de'i tshe ji ltar mis grib ma mthong ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong ngo / /de bas na grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhes
195a1(mdo sde): bya ste/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o/ /yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro/ /yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te/ /yid ni rab tu 'khrugs pa yis/ /smras pa dang ni byas pa dag /de ni sdug bsngal ldan par 'gyur/ /shing rta rab tu drangs
195a2(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni nyon mongs pa bye ba'i don to/ /yid kyang rab tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs pas 'khrugs zhes bya'o/ /sems gang gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang du zhugs pa'i
195a3(mdo sde): don to/ /de nas smra ba dang byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'gro ste/ shing rta rab tu drangs pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'khor lo ba lang gi rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du/ sdig pa'i phung pos 'khor ba'i 'phang lo sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
195a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams rab tu 'khyam mo/ /de bas na bsod nams la g.yel bar byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga' ba zhes bya bar grub bo/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal ba'i 'o ma la mar yod par rtogs pas mi rnams srub la/ ci'i phyir chu la mi rnams mi
195a5(mdo sde): srub ce na rdzas med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir mi rnams tshul khrims srung zhing tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal mi gser 'dod pa rtog pa dang ldan pa brag la rko la/ ci'i phyir
195a6(mdo sde): shing la mi rko/ rdo ba gser gyi dbyings yod pa la ni rko'i/ shing gser med pa la mi rko'o/ /de bzhin du 'jam dpal dbyings yod pa la rtog pa'i mi rnams bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam ste/ tshul khrims srung zhing tshangs par spyod do/ /gzhan
195a7(mdo sde): yang 'jam dpal dbyings med na ni tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro/ /lo bye bar chu la bsrubs kyang snum mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ gal te bdag gi dbyings med na/ bdag la chags pas tshangs pa dang / tshul khrims spyod pa rnams don med
195b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ tshangs par spyod pa tshangs par spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de'i don ci lags/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la rol pa spangs/ sor mo'i phreng bas kyang gsol pa/ lha dang mi mang po nges par
195b2(mdo sde): des ltung ba'i chos su mkhyen nas 'dod pa'i 'du shes spangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba de skad ma zer cig /sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pas/ sems can thams cad chos kyi spun
195b3(mdo sde): yin no/ /bud med thams cad ni sring mo yin no/ /sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / lha mo sgyu ma yang lcam dral na/ ji ltar yab yum du 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'jig rten gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir sgyu
195b4(mdo sde): ma'i bya bas bstan to/ /'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gyad gnyis skugs stong btsugs te/ dam bcas pas gcig la gcig brdeg cing mi btsam pa'i tshul gyis skugs stong phrog par ston pas rgyal po dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar byed na 'gro ba rnams kyis de'i bye brag
195b5(mdo sde): mi shes so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thabs byas te yab yum dang bdag nyid skyes bu brtan por ston te/ de nas phyis 'gro ba mang po yang srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi zad pa las sgrol na/ sems can rnams kyis de'i bye brag mi shes so/ /'di
195b6(mdo sde): lta ste/ rol mo la 'dus pa'i nang du skyes bu gar mkhan gar byed cing gar dang gtam gyi tshigs su skyes pa dang / bud med dang / ma ning du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba mang po myur du mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag gi
195b7(mdo sde): lus gar mkhan chen po lta bur lus bstan te/ sems can bye ba mang po sgrol ba/ sems can rnams kyis skyes bu'i thabs su mi shes so/ /'di lta ste/ rol mo la 'dus pa'i dbus su sgyu ma byed pas/ bdag nyid rnam pa mang por gcod cing rtse bas 'gro ba
196a1(mdo sde): mang po dga' bar byas pa yang snad pa'am/ phog pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du sgyu ma byed pa ltar bdag nyid sems can mang po la phan par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid sgyu ma sprul pa ston to/ /yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad
196a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten kun la legs par rab tu gzigs na/ thog ma med pa tshun chad 'khor bar 'pho zhing 'khyam pa na/ mar ma gyur pa med/ sring mor ma gyur pa med de/ ma yang chung mar gyur/ bran yang phar gyur/
196a3(mdo sde): pha yang bran du gyur te/ tshe rabs bye ba mang por 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni gar mkhan bzhin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs par spyod pa mdzad do// //bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal rang gi dbyings dang lhan cig
196a4(mdo sde): tu 'dod chen pa'i rtsed mo byas pa gang bde ba rang gis bzung ste/ smra ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid ma ning du skyes na/ bde ba de dang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'byung ngo / /bud med la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/ skyes pa yang de
196a5(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /bdag nyid kyis bzung nas smra ba bzhin du ci rung bar 'gyur ram/ de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni dbyings gcig go/ /tshangs par spyod pa brtsams te/ bdag nyid gzhag par mi 'gyur ba'i gan du de bzhin gshegs pa
196a6(mdo sde): phyin to/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad tshangs par spyod pa la rab tu ma bkod/ ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma rnams
196a7(mdo sde): ni ka ba bzhi pa'i khang ba lta bus dam pa'i chos kyi rgyur dpe bstan na/ sdig pa chen po yang rab tu 'byung bar gda' ste/ ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de ltar sdig pa rab tu gda' bar gyur/ ci'i slad du yang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams
196b1(mdo sde): kyi 'dul ba'i chos bcas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni 'du shes gzhan te/ 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi ming du btags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gnas la bkod kyang sgra gcan 'dzin gyi
196b2(mdo sde): tshul du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyang tha dad pa de dri ba 'di ni mi dri ba zhes bya'o/ /'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings yin pas na/ srog gcod pa spangs pa ni sangs rgyas so/ /rigs kyi bu ji ltar
196b3(mdo sde): bdag gsod pa ltar 'jig rten na srog gcod pa yang de bzhin te/ bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'joms pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du mtshungs par gzigs la/ bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'chang ba skyon chags pa
196b4(mdo sde): ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad cing bsad par bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgra gcan 'dzin dang mtshungs par gzigs so/ /'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal skyes bu chos 'dod pa
196b5(mdo sde): zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las la la zhig gis bstan te/ zas lan cig par gyur na/ srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste de ltar gyur na de dag la srog gcod pa dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal shin tu bde ba 'dod
196b6(mdo sde): pa'i bde ba de las phyir phyogs pa'i 'phags pa 'dod pa 'joms pa ni bdag gsod pa'o/ /gal te 'phags pa rnams de ltar gyur na/ bdag gsod pa'i sdig par 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'dod pa'i sems skyed cing gzhan gyi drung du gnas te/ bdag 'dod pa'i
196b7(mdo sde): sems skyes na ji ltar bya zhes ma zer cig / de las ngo tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nga'i lus gcig yod kyang rung / med kyang rung dpa' bo ltar 'dug pas bdag gsod pa ni bdag gi khams 'joms par 'gyur ram/ de ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
197a1(mdo sde): de ni bsod nams kyi phung po'o/ /de bzhin du 'jam dpal 'phags pa yang 'di ltar bdag gsod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te/ gzhan gsod par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig ni skyon chags pa'i ya
197a2(mdo sde): mtshan can dam pa'i chos 'jig pa rnams bdag gi nyon mongs pa mi zad pa ltar de dag med par byed cing / tshul ma yin par gnod pa'ang byed du 'jug ste/ de dag ni bdag la mchod pa yin no/ /ji ltar bdag sdug par 'dod pa dang / bde ba dang / zas
197a3(mdo sde): dang / srog 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bdag spong bar 'dod pas skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rig pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i slad du sangs rgyas rnams
197a4(mdo sde): sha mi gsol lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu de bzhin te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs de dag la sems can thams cad mar ma gyur pa dang / sring mor ma gyur pa gang yang med do/ /khyir gyur
197a5(mdo sde): pa yang phar gyur te/ 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni bro mkhan bzhin no/ /de bas na bdag gi sha dang / gzhan gyi sha yang sha gcig pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo/ /gzhan yang 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni chos kyi
197a6(mdo sde): dbyings te/ dbyings gcig tu gyur pa'i sha za bar 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sbrang rtsi dang / dung dang / lham dang / dar gyi srin bu la sogs pa rang gi dbyings kyi sha ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
197a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig /sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lus spangs pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ni zang zing med pa yin na chags pa'i rdzas ci la'ang sten pa de ni gnas ma yin te/ zang zing la bsnyen pa ni thabs kyi chos nyid
197b1(mdo sde): do/ /'di rdzas gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa la bsnyen par byed de/ rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang der bsnyen par mi bya'o/ /gsod pa'i lag ma yin par gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bsnyen du rung ngo / /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ tshong 'dus gcig na lham
197b2(mdo sde): mkhan gyis ko ba las lham drubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul na/ gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa de bzhes sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te ma he rang chos bzhin du gum nas ma he bdag
197b3(mdo sde): po gdol pa las ko ba blangs te/ lham mkhan btsal nas lham du drubs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na/ de gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma he chos bzhin du shi bar gyur la/ ma he'i bdag pos
197b4(mdo sde): lham 'drub tu bcug nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na blang bar bya'am/ 'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang 'thun nam/ snying rje med pa yin te/ tshul khrims ral bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ rmo brko yang bgyir mi rung ngo / /
197b5(mdo sde): chu mi gtsang bas btsos pa'i zas kyang mi blang ngo / /de lta lags na dge slong dag la de lta bu gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste/ gal te dge bsnyen yod na ni zas dang skom chu gtsang ma dang sbyor cig /gang
197b6(mdo sde): na dge bsnyen yod par rmo brko mi bya'o/ /gang na dge bsnyen med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya/ thang la yang srog chags yod/ chu'i nang na yang srog chags yod/ nam mkha' la yang srog chags yod do/ /gal te de ltar rnam par dag pa
197b7(mdo sde): grub pa rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur ram/ rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu/ de ni 'jig rten na mi 'dri ba zhes bya ba'i dri ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'ang ring zhig tshun chad bdag nyid sha za ba
198a1(mdo sde): la mi gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'jig rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang 'thun pa yod pa de yang thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal 'jig rten pa rnams kyang thar pa brjod
198a2(mdo sde): de/ de dag la thar pa med kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do/ /de dag la yang rab tu 'byung ba yod de/ de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do/ /'jig rten pa la yang sha za ba
198a3(mdo sde): ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de/ de yang bdag nyid bdag nyid kyi sha la mi za ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha za bar nges so/ /'jam dpal 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo sde 'di las bstan pa nyan 'dod dam/
198a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i bskal pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa bskal pa yangs pa bas kyang ches yangs pa/ dpag tu med pa
198a5(mdo sde): bas kyang ches dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ko san ta bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du grong 'dir byung ste/ /de'i tshe ya mtshan can med cing ya mtshan can gyi ming yang med do/ /sems can theg pa chen po par gyur te/ sems
198a6(mdo sde): can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo mang du bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang lo mang du gnas nas/ dam pa'i chos
198a7(mdo sde): nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i dus na/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshe/ dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon pa na gnas te/ dge slong de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis/ rin
198b1(mdo sde): thang med pa'i gos byin nas/ dge slong des rjes su gzung ba'i phyir blangs te/ i shin 'da'i ra ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang / i shin 'da'i mis gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste/ nub mo mun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste/ gos de phrogs
198b2(mdo sde): nas ri khrod du khrid de/ gcer bur phyung nas/ shing la lag pa gyen du dam por bcings te song ngo / /de'i nub mo mun khung na me tog thu ba'i bram ze skon pa thogs te/ 'brog dgon par 'ongs nas nam langs te/ tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag
198b3(mdo sde): ste/ stag des bsad la thug pa dang / ci thar du bros te/ bdag nyid rab tu mi dga' zhing song song na dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas/ /kye ma dge sbyong dgon pa pa ngur smrig can 'dir 'ongs na/ ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni thar bar mi 'gyur ba lta
198b4(mdo sde): zhig snyam ste/ lag pa bsgreng nas lus gcer bur byung la dka' thub spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ lam 'di nges par thar ba'i lam du legs par bsgrub pa yin nam zhes dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te/ skra btogs nas mgo reg gcer
198b5(mdo sde): bu pa'i dge sbyong du gyur te/ de las dge sbyong gcer bu pa byung ngo / /dge slong de bdag nyid bcings pa khrol nas shing shun blangs te sa ser pos byugs nas/ thang la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / 'di ni ngur
198b6(mdo sde): smrig gyon pa'i dge slong ste/ ngur smrig bor la/ btsag gis byugs te song na/ thar pa'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste/ /'di ni dge bar 'gro ba'am/ ci zhes de kun du rgyu bar gyur te/ /de las mur 'dug kun du rgyu ba byung ngo / /dge slong phye ma red tshur zhugs
198b7(mdo sde): te/ rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas skra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g.yogs te/ sbrul bsad pa'i ras ba lang rdzis bor ba gyon te/ khrus byed pa de skyes bu shing thu ba gzhan zhig gis mthong ste/ snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs pa mthong nas/ dge sbyong 'di ni
199a1(mdo sde): ngur smrig gyon te/ rgyal mtshan ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/ ral pa ring por byas te/ rtswa gos gyon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka' thub spyod pa yin du bzung nas/ de dge ba yin nam zhes 'di nyid thar
199a2(mdo sde): pa'i lam ste/ gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can du gyur te/ de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo / /dge slong de tshur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rnag gis yog ste/ rang gi lus rdul gyis gang zhing sbrang ma 'du zhing dge slong de skra 'jam
199a3(mdo sde): pos g.yogs pa mthong nas/ mur 'dug spyod pa dang / phyugs bdag pa rnams de ltar byung ngo / /dge slong de ba lang gi lci ba yar ke ma'i me bus te bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/ ba lang gi lci ba'i ril bu can thog ma de nas
199a4(mdo sde): byung ngo / /dge slong de rma la sdug bsngal reg par shes nas/ dpa' bo ltar 'dug pa skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste/ ngur smrig gyon pa ni thar par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas ci legs par 'gro'am snyam ste/ mi g.yo ba'i sar
199a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas/ mi g.yo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to/ /de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas der lhags te/ dge slong de ci dang ci lta ba mthong nas log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang gzhan
199a6(mdo sde): du brtags so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ phan tshun du su mthong nas/ gsad snyam du bsams te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo / /dper na dbyar zla ra ba rnams smig
199a7(mdo sde): rgyu ba la chu yin snyam du bsams te/ mchi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs
199b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na de lta bu byung na chos nub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag gi de kho na ni 'di 'dra de 'dra'o zhes log par lta ba bzhin du 'di lta ste/ thar pa dang bdag dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la ldem
199b2(mdo sde): po ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes mur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go/ /rjes su dpag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la yang gti mug gi chos kyi dbang du song ngo / /'jig rten las 'das pa la yang ldem po ngag tu bshad pa mi
199b3(mdo sde): shes pas shes pa nyams te/ de'i phyir phyogs gnyis spangs te/ bdag tu gtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dbu ma'i lam du bstan to/ /dbu ma'i lam zhes bya
199b4(mdo sde): ba ni theg pa chen po'i so/ /sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/ dbu ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas sems can mang
199b5(mdo sde): du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro/ /sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang du mdo sde la smod pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang / 'dod chen pa ji snyed 'byung
199b6(mdo sde): ba bshad du gsol/ phyogs gang du sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba ston pa yang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul gyi dbus 'dir mdo sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba
199b7(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo / /shar phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo / /lho phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu
200a1(mdo sde): bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu 'byung ngo / /nub phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'byung ngo / /byang phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
200a2(mdo sde): brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu 'byung ngo / /kha che ba'i yul du yang nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang gter mi stor to/ /b+ha ru ka tsar yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du 'gyur ro/ /ri b+hin d+h+ya la yang de bzhin no/ /
200a3(mdo sde): kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams bsgrub pa'i don mi shes nas theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung ste/ nga la skur pa de ji lta bya zhes nga yang ngo tsha ba skye'o/ /lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te/ /nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin
200a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dngos po chen po brgyad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / ther zug dang / zhi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brtan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
200a5(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ram/
200a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin te/ lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo du ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyod lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa
200a7(mdo sde): dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
200b1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i srid chen po mi bzhed cing khur chen po thogs te/ stong gsum pa rnams bsgral lo zhes bskal pa bye ba mang por bsgral ba de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyang bskal pa bye ba mang por nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i
200b2(mdo sde): bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer bar mi 'dod do/ /yang 'jam dpal khyod lta bu'i dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyi khur chen po khyer te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos phrag la bskur ro
200b3(mdo sde): snyam nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling dang / gling phran thams cad kyi sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa ther zug zhi ba/ g.yung drung yin no zhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /sems can rnams yid ches kyang rung / mi ches
200b4(mdo sde): kyang rung / nga'i lus bsad dam/ dum bur byas kyang rung / gdod bdag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te/ khur khyer ba rab tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas 'byung ngo / /nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dang / khyod la sogs
200b5(mdo sde): pa sems can bye ba mang po yod de de'i phyir lho phyogs kyi rgyud rab tu bsngags so/ /nga'i chos tha ma der ston par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzem pa dang / 'jigs pa dang /
200b6(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi rgyus nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyi khrims byas pa thos nas/ bdag nyid kyang skye dgu skyong ba de bzhin du kha che'i yul gyi 'khor dang / yul b+ha ru ka tsa ba rnams kyang ngo tsha ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas
200b7(mdo sde): theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsangs te ston par 'gyur gyi/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sog bur gyi phung po'i nang du me bcug na/ sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig
201a1(mdo sde): pa'i lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal dang po nga skyes pa'i sa na nan tan lhur byed pa zhig ste/ tshig pa las lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i sa der byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas dam
201a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur ba der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i g.yog mang po dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos
201a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung zhing rjes su gtad par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo
201a4(mdo sde): sde 'di'i ming bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka mdo sde 'di'i ming sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /kau shi ka mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /de nas dbang
201a5(mdo sde): po'i bu thu bo mngon du khro zhes bya ba sdug pa dga' ba yid du 'ong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gi pha nam lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe/ kha lo sgyur ba bsam 'dzin
201a6(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba la/ lha rnams 'phel ba dang / lha ma yin bas par 'gyur ba de ltar shing rta drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / lha gzhan du ma dgongs shig /bdag ni sngar gum ste/ khyod ni slad kyis so/ /grub kyang rung / ma grub kyang rung ste/ bdag gi
201a7(mdo sde): srog kyang bor/ gzhan dang mdza' ba'ang spangs nas go cha chen po bgos pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin
201b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rtag pa nyid dang / ther zug nyid dang / g.yung drung nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa las de slad kyis 'di snyam du sems skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan par bya ba'i bstan pa'i sems can mang por mi 'dug gis/ /da ni mi bstan to snyam ste/
201b2(mdo sde): de'i thabs byas pa thos nas/ bdag kyang skyes bu bsam 'dzin ces bgyi ba de 'dra bar chos kyi shing rta sbyar te/ ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa nyid dang / ther zug pa nyid dang / g.yung drung nyid dang / zhi ba nyid du 'jig rten du rgyas par 'gyur ba de
201b3(mdo sde): ltar bdag gi srog kyang btang ste/ bdag gi dge slong gi tshul gyis bstan cing bskal pa thams cad du rnam par dag par bgyis par gyur cig /de nas dbang po'i bu mang po dang / bud med dang / bu mo dang / lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
201b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang srog kyang btang ste/ dge slong gi tshul dang / dge slong ma'i tshul dang / dge bsnyen gyi tshul dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul gyis skyes bu dam pa de'i g.yog 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs
201b5(mdo sde): so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu dam pa'i chos 'dod pa khyed thams cad de bzhin gyis shig /ngas kyang dam pa'i chos 'dod pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o/ /de dag gi thad du nga rtag tu 'chag cing gnas so/ /khyed rnams ci nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba dang / nga'i byas pa
201b6(mdo sde): shes shing brtan par gyis la/ de nas khyed thams cad kyis rtag pa'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas yin no zhes ston cig /de nas yul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po dang / dmag dpon la bsgo ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong la/
201b7(mdo sde): mi'i gzugs su srin po mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bsad de/ sor mo'i phreng ba byas nas byang khrag gis bskus shing stobs dang rtsal chen po rab tu 'khyam zhing grong khyer 'di nas gnag pa'i dgongs bzhi bcu tsam na 'dug cing / bdag gi ma yang deng gsad de
202a1(mdo sde): mi nyis stong du tshang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de rab tu dga'o zhes grag gis ma rungs pa sdig can gtum po 'di bsad na/ gdod bdag cag grong dang / grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / lung pa'i gnas na dmag mi thams cad kyang rang gi khyim nas 'byung ngo / /
202a2(mdo sde): de bas na bya khras bya rog dang / bya bran skrag pa bzhin du bdag cag gi skye bo thams cad dang / shing thun dang / rtswa rnga ba dang / yul gzhan gyi mi dang / skye bo 'dron pa'i rnams kyang de'i ming tsam gyis mi rgyu zhing mi smra bar gyur cing 'dug gis myur du sbron pa khyer te/ yul mdzod
202a3(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig tu chas te/ srin po ma rungs pa gtum po sor mo'i phreng ba bsad par byin gyis bkrabs pa thams cad kyang ral gri dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mdung thung dang / phub lag na thogs te/
202a4(mdo sde): mtshon cha dang / lag cha thams cad rnon por byos te/ legs par chos la gshegs shig /gang gis srin po ma rungs pa sor mo'i phreng ba bsad dam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ bal glang zhon pa dag smas sam/ gang dag smas kyang g.yul las phyir mi ldog na bal
202a5(mdo sde): glang 'dod na yang bal glang gi mchog sbyin no/ /rta 'dod na yang rta bzhon pa sbyin no/ /gser 'dod na yang gser dang gser gyi dong tse dang nam sa ya sbyin no/ /dngul 'dod na yang dngul sa ya sbyin no/ /rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin
202a6(mdo sde): po che sna bdun sa ya snyed sbyin no/ /gos 'dod pa la yang lha'i gos dang / dar dang / ras phran ko tam pa dang / yul bang gi ras dang / yul ma tu ra dang / ba ru ka tsa dang / ba ring dra dang / lho phyogs pa dang / sang ka shi ka dang / ku ru pan tsa la'i ras bam rnam pa mang po
202a7(mdo sde): sbyin no/ /zhing dor dang / grong dang / ma he dang / bud med 'dod pa'ang thams cad kyi mchog sbyin no zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ming tsam gyis zham ring ba la gtogs so cog skrag ste/ gcig kyang phyir ma byung ngo / /btsun mo'i 'khor dang / zham ring pa yang
202b1(mdo sde): khyi dang 'dra bar gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pas 'tsho ba 'chi ba la thug par gyur te/ rang rang gi lag cha thogs nas/ bal glang pa dang / rta pa dang / dpung bu chung ba rnams rab tu brgyan te/ rgyal po ga la ba der 'ongs so/ /de nas btsun mo yang kyi hud 'bod cing sdig can
202b2(mdo sde): de'i gan du ma bzhud cig / skye bo thams cad dang gzhan gyi yul 'khor rnams ni ma mchis kyang mi mdo'i/ lha la nongs pa byung nga re/ de nas mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba dang / mdun na 'don pa dang / rig pa dang / ltas 'debs pa rnams la sor mo'i phreng ba de
202b3(mdo sde): ring sod dam mi sod dris na/ mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba rnams kyis de ring sor mo'i phreng ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po de dag gi tshig la yid ma ches nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs kyi dmag dang lhan cig
202b4(mdo sde): tu song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag pas gdong dang dpral ba rdul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/ yul mdzod
202b5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khyed kyi gdong dang dpral ba rab tu rdul na ci/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ lag pa 'di rkang pa 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sor mo'i phreng ba zhes bgyi ba srin po mi stong dgu brgya bkum
202b6(mdo sde): nas/ sor mo'i phreng ba brgyus te phreng ba thogs nas/ bdag dang 'thab ces sdod cing mchis so/ /bdag la 'du ba thams cad kyi sgo yang bcad de shing a sho ka'i drung na gcig pu mchis pa bya rog dang / khra 'khor ba de'i ming tsam gyis skrag ste/ bdag gi gsol pa de
202b7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po ci thab mo byed par 'dod dam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal snga nas tshad ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
203a1(mdo sde): po chen po nga'ang 'gro'am/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes bka' stsal pa ni sems can mang po la skal ba mchis pa lta ste/ da ni sor mo'i phreng ba de yang gum lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te
203a2(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng ba 'dir 'ongs na ji ltar bya/ de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs snying rab tu dngangs skrag nas rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes pas snying dga' ste/ mi 'jigs nas rgyal pos gsol pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba gal te 'dir mchis na/
203a3(mdo sde): gcig pu lus par 'gyur lags grang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sor mo'i phreng ba 'di'i dpal la ltos/ de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la ring zhig tu mig mi
203a4(mdo sde): 'dzums par bltas na/ sor mo'i phreng ba mig dmar la bdag nyid che ba'i gzugs mthong nas/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal shin tu 'jigs shing skrag ste ba spu yang langs nas/ 'dul ba ltar go cha rnams zhig cing mtshon thams cad shubs nas byung
203a5(mdo sde): ste/ mda' ste'u ka ltar thams cad du ltung ba yang byi la ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri'i drung du mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du snyoms par gzigs pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad
203a6(mdo sde): sgra de thos nas/ glang po dang / rta dang / bal glang dang / rkang thang pa'i dmag de rnams sde gyes pa bzhin du nyams te/ la la ni brgyal/ la la ni 'gyel/ la la ni 'chi la thug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal
203a7(mdo sde): pa/ rgyal po chen po tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyon cig dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur gyis ma skrag cig /gang zhig snga na bag med pa/ /bag yod par ni phyis gyur na/ /sprin las byung ba'i zla ba bzhin/ /'jig rten 'di na snang bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
203b1(mdo sde): skye bo thams cad dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer btang ste/ sems can gang 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bde bar gyur te/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor dang / bu dang / grong gi skye bo sems can
203b2(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas sor mo'i phreng ba btul lo snyam ste thams cad der lhags so/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma 'o bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mir bcas pa rnams ston pas sdig pa'i chos
203b3(mdo sde): can 'di lta bu yang dam pa'i chos la bzhag pas na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtan pas/ sngar bag med pa lta bur bstan la/ phyis bdag gi che ba
203b4(mdo sde): nyid kyang ston pas de 'jig rten na sprin las grol ba'i zla ba lta bur mdzes par gyur te/ sems can bye ba mang po bsgral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid kyang ston to/ /rgyal po chen po sor mo'i phreng ba ni sdig can ma yin te/ thabs 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
203b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/ mkhan po'i mchis brang dang lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod cing mkhan po'i dmod pa'i chos kyi 'drer gyur na ci'i slad du sdig par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba mkhan po'i chung ma dang
203b6(mdo sde): lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod pa ma yin gyi/ mkhan po'i chung mas gzugs mthong nas sems gyur te/ sdig pa rab tu byed pa ltar mkhan po'i chos kyis rtse bar thams cad rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po
203b7(mdo sde): che brdeg pa ni bong bus mi bzod do/ /de bzhin du rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mi mchog glang po che'i dgongs te gsungs pa'i gsang ba'i sos phog pa'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi bzod do/ /de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i
204a1(mdo sde): gsang bas phog pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bzod do/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis
204a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de na nyan thos dang rang
204a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang med/ theg pa gcig las theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / sdug bsngal yang med/ yid mi bde ba yang med/ rab tu bde ba thams cad dang ldan te/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/ sems can de dag thams cad
204a4(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / kha dog tshad med de/ 'gro ba de dag gi dpe dang rgyu dang / byed pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta bu dpe med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams
204a5(mdo sde): cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyor la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig / de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sor mo'i phreng ba 'di nyid yin te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi che ba de 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis
204a6(mdo sde): mi khyab bo/ /de nas lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pas mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba rnams
204a7(mdo sde): la/ kye ma smra ba khyed nga'i drung na ma gnas shig ces brgyad cing smad nas bskrad do/ /de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / grong dang
204b1(mdo sde): grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / lung pa'i mi rnams dang / ri khrod pa dang / mnyan du yod pa'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus lhags te/ sor mo'i phreng ba'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshigs
204b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mtha' yas sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs kyi sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sor phreng khyod kyi zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/ khyod kyi 'jam pa'i zhabs la bzod par gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sor phreng
204b3(mdo sde): mtshan 'dzin pa/ /bram ze'i gzugs kyis bdag cag don phyir gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog dpal 'bar deng 'dir gshegs/ /dpal ldan gzi brjid mthu mnga' bzod par gsol/ /tshig gis mngon du gsung ba mtha' yas sku/ /khyod ni yang dang
204b4(mdo sde): yang bying mang po yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas skyabs byed skyabs su gyur/ /gnyen med rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'das pa gnyis mdzes te/ /'di na chos spyod shin tu ngo mtshar rmad/ /me las pad mo skye ba ngo mtshar bzhin/ /'jig
204b5(mdo sde): rten sangs rgyas gnyis ston mchog de 'dra/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ ltos rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
204b6(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag par rab tu dga' ba sdug cing mos pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
204b7(mdo sde): gzhes pa de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad med/ theg pa gcig las theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba thams cad dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/ gzi brjid
205a1(mdo sde): dang / kha dog dpag tu med/ 'jig rten na dpe dang / rgyu dang byed pa med de/ rtag tu dga' zhing mos pa dang / dpe med pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs
205a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyor te rjes su yi rang bar byos shig /de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan ma yin gyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis kyi ming
205a3(mdo sde): gang gis thos sam/ de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na/ sems can de dag gi khyim nyid du dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten mthong ste/ ngan 'gro rnam pa bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyi ming thos nas phyi rol pa rnams dang / phas pham pa dang / mtshams med par gyur
205a4(mdo sde): pas 'phya ba'am/ sting ba'am/ 'dran tor ram/ gzhan gyis bzlas sam/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs bcad kyi phyir yang rung ste/ de dag gis ngan 'gro bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di gnyis kyi ming
205a5(mdo sde): gis bsrung bar byas na dgon pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa'i dus thams cad du'ang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis 'jigs pa thams cad kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa byung ba thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
205a6(mdo sde): za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha zas kyang mi tshugs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni che ba'i bdag nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni de lta'o/ /
205a7(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid glang po che 'di gnyis la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang skyed cig /sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma yang ma brjed par gsos shig /ngas sor mo'i phreng ba'i lag nas de'i
205b1(mdo sde): ma rgan mo thar bar byas te sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis ma ma bsad cig / bsad pas mtho ris su mi 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang / ral gri thogs te 'ongs nas skad cig de nyid la de'i bar du 'dug pa ni chos la gzhug pa'i thabs so/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma ta la bdun tsam gyi
205b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di zhes smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi sgyu ma sprul pa ni/ /sems can mang po dag gis mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i rgyal po'i sku che zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku mnga'o/ /de 'di skad ces smras
205b3(mdo sde): nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ci sgyu ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'di ni sprul pa yin no/ /sprul
205b4(mdo sde): pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgyu ma yang de bzhin no/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di zhes smras so/ /seng ge dang wa 'dre yun ring zhig tu mdza' bor byas
205b5(mdo sde): kyang / des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin par mi nus te/ wa 'dre yang thos pa tsam gyis mchi'o/ /yang ci wa 'dre de dom gyi skad du 'byin na/ seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa yin nam/ seng ge yang wa dang dom gyi sgra skad du'ang nga ro mi 'byin gyi/ seng ge'i sgrar sgrogs
205b6(mdo sde): so/ /de bzhin du wa 'dre lta bu bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu'i mkhan po byas te/ yun ring mo zhig tu lhan cig 'khod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad 'dzin lta ga la nus te/ gal te 'di thabs ma yin na de'i rtsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/ lta bu
205b7(mdo sde): bdag gi glen pa'i chos la spyod pa dang / nyan du gzhug pa lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' ni glen pa'i chos mi spyod pa ste/ spyod pa yang thams cad la bu gcig pa lta bu'i byams par spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sgyu ma mang po ni sems can bye ba dang / bram ze'i mkhan
206a1(mdo sde): pos mi shes te/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o/ /mkhan po'i chung ma dga' byed mas smras pa/ kye ma sems can 'di bram ze'i bu mo 'jo ma'i dku mthong yang sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par mi shes so/ /ji ltar tsan
206a2(mdo sde): tsa sgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma sprul pa'o/ /de bas na mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis bsnyad do/ /gdol pas khyod la bsnyen par mi nus na/ rgyal po sems can mang po dang 'gro ba'i dpal dang / byin gyis brgyal bar 'gyur na/ mdun du
206a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa lta ci smos/ de ltar mis mi'i drung du bstan par mi nus na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bsgyur bar lta ga la nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang /
206a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin tshad med pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis de la gnod par byed do/ /gal te 'di lta bu'i sems 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig byed pa rnam pa mang po ston te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed pa 'byung ba dag la yang de
206a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyi sku ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas yang rgyal po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci sgyu ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mkhan po dang / mkhan
206a6(mdo sde): po'i chung ma dang / de'i ma sgyu ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhin te/ nga'i sgyu ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas na rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te/ sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba de ltar byon pa yin no/ /rgyal pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen
206a7(mdo sde): po stsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba lho phyogs logs kyi sbyin gnas su gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gyur cig /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di
206b1(mdo sde): dag smras so/ /sgyu ma'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' chen thabs kyi sku/ /thabs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu phun sum tshogs/ /thabs mchog dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston/ /thabs kyi dbyings rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad/ /thabs kyis sprul pa dag ni yongs su
206b2(mdo sde): ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtha' yas te/ /blo gros mtha' yas grags pa'ang mtha' yas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas te/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas stobs chen ston mdzad pa/ /gsang ba mtha' las mtha' yas dgongs dag ston/ /'jig rten rab tu snang
206b3(mdo sde): mdzad mtha' yas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /yon tan mtha' med grangs las shin tu 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs ni mtshungs med dpag tu med/ /chags med ye shes nam mkha' lta bur ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /'jam dpal
206b4(mdo sde): gzhon gyur phan byed zhi bar byed/ /sor phreng slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa ni/ /gshegs dang ma gshegs shes kyang brjod mi nus/ /bde gshegs sgra gcan zin ltar snyoms par gzigs/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
206b5(mdo sde): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i phreng ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems
206b6(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa dang / de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i lung theg pa chen po'i mdo las me tog u dum bA ra ltar rab tu rnyed dka' ba/
206b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI la dang / rgya'i lo ts+tsha ba ban de tong A tsar+ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
207a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ rA dza de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
207a2(mdo sde): 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de ring rgyal po gzugs can
207a3(mdo sde): snying po gdul bar bya ba'i dus la bab kyis yul ma ga d+hAr 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la ldings te gshegs pa blon po zla ba bzang pos mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha lags sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa 'o skol gyi yul du
207a4(mdo sde): byon pas grong khyer brgyan pa dang bsnyen bkur bya bar rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling na nga las che ba med par su la bsnyen bkur byed ces slar nyid du dregs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang gi sgor gdan bshams pa la bcom ldan 'das
207a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so/ /de ltar bzhugs par shes nas rgyal pos gyad chen po'i 'degs pa zhes bya ba rbad de rdo shin tu che ba bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so/ /rdo de nam mkha' la lding zhing de las sgra 'di skad ces grag go/ /kye ma 'dus byas rtag pa med/ /skye zhing 'gog
207a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin/ /skye ba yod na 'chi ba yod/ /'du ba yod na 'bral ba yod/ /bsags pa yod na 'dzad pa yod/ /lang tsho'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog /'tsho ba'i tshe yang 'chi bas 'phrog /chags par gyur na sdug bsngal 'phel/ /skyo bar byas na thar bar 'gyur/ /zhes
207a7(mdo sde): pa de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos pas mos par gyur te thad du song nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos la mos par bya/ khong du chud par bya/ bsgo bar bya/ yid 'byung bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom
207b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang la skyo bar bgyi/ yid 'byung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ci'i phyir 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor
207b2(mdo sde): ba 'di mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'di ji skad mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag la/ bcud kyi sems can yang mi rtag go/ /rgyal pos
207b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ snod kyi 'jig rten ji ltar mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab gling khams kyang / /'jig pa'i dus tshe bskal pa'i me byung nas/ /thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang ma lus so/ /chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no/ /
207b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang dbyar drod skye la dgun grang skam/ /lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med/ /lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye/ /de la sogs te mi rtag mngon sum ni/ /rtag pa yin na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcud kyi sems can ji ltar mi
207b5(mdo sde): rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcud kyi sems can tshe 'di nyid la yang / /nyin zhag lo zla rim gyis gcod byed pas/ /nyin zhag 'das shing 'chi dang phar phar nye/ /mi shir 'dod kyang rang la rang dbang med/ /skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra/ /'chi
207b6(mdo sde): bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra/ /'chi ba'i rkyen ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /'chi rkyen ma song dngos po gang yang med/ /lus 'di zas kyis 'tsho yang brnangs nas 'chi/ /'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun/ /'chi bdag dbang du mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /snga ma shi ba'i
207b7(mdo sde): mi rnams kun gyis kyang / /rtag tu re nas bu dang nor bsags kyang / /bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan pa med/ /rang gi dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'chi/ /da ltar rang gi gnas pa'i ring 'di la'ang / /dga' bshes gnyen 'dun mdza' dang mi mdza' dang / /na tshod 'thun dang
208a1(mdo sde): rgan gzhon ji snyed cig / shi ba mthong zhing thos pa ma yin nam/ /sa steng gnas pa'i sems can 'di kun yang / /lo brgya tshun chad sdod kyang ma lus 'chi/ /de bas rang re'ang 'chi ba'i chos can yin/ /deng 'chi sang 'chi sus kyang mi shes te/ /tshod
208a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yang mi 'jigs sbyin med pas/ sang phod deng sang bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i tshe na pha ma bu tsha dang / /phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor kun kyang / /bdag nyid 'chi ba'i phyi na 'ong med pas/ /sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /de bas skyes
208a3(mdo sde): kyang bdag nyid gcig pu skyes/ tha ma 'chi yang bdag nyid gcig pu 'chi/ /skad cig tshe las 'thun pa nye gzhi rnams/ /'gron po gnas 'thun tsam ste so sor 'gro/ /skad cig tsam yang 'bral bar mi phod pa'i/ /gnyen dang nor rdzas yul mkhar kun bor nas/ /bdag
208a4(mdo sde): nyid gcig pu 'jigs pa'i lam du 'gro/ /ji tsam sdig dang bsdos nas nor bsags kyang / sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag nyid 'khur/ /bsags pa'i nor ni khong dag bu tshas 'khyer/ /de phyir bsags pa'i nor gyis ci zhig phan/ /bdag la shin tu phangs pa'i
208a5(mdo sde): lus 'di yang / /shi ba'i dus su rdza zhig bzhin du 'bor/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sha rus gnyis kyang 'bye/ /dbang med bdag nyid gcig pu 'khyams nas ni/ /las kyi dbang gis gang du skyes gyur na/ /de bas lus kyi phyir ni sdig mi bya/ /lus 'di sa gting
208a6(mdo sde): 'gro ste chog mi shes/ /mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang phung po yin/ /na rga 'chi sogs sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas/ /shi nas lus bor sa yi phyogs tsam btsog /bya dang khyi spyang la sogs rnams kyis za/ /bsnyen bkur 'bad kyang 'chi bdag srin pos 'phrog /mkhas
208a7(mdo sde): pas smod cing blun po chags pa'i gnas/ /de bas mkhas pa lus la su zhig chags/ /lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar 'jug mi bya/ /'di la gla rngan gos zas byin nas su/ /yun gyi phan phyir bsod nams sog tu gzhug /bdag gi grogs ni dge sdig gnyis las med/ /
208b1(mdo sde): de yang dge ba mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu/ /sdig pa ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /ma shi bar du'ang lus ni mi rtag ste/ /bu chung byis pa gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas dar la bab dang dar yol dang / /rgas par gyur te lus 'di rtag na ni/ /gnas skabs de snyed cig ni
208b2(mdo sde): cis te 'gyur/ /longs spyod bde sdug rnams kyang mi rtag ste/ /btsan phyug 'dzom pa sdug phongs can du 'gyur/ /sdug phongs can yang btsan phyug 'dzom par 'gyur/ /lang tsho longs spyod na rga 'chi bas 'joms/ /'jig rten chos 'di thams cad mi rtag go/ /rgyal
208b3(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba pa 'di'i sdug bsngal ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba pa la nam yang bde ba med/ /byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /sdug bsngal gtso bo skye rga na 'chi
208b4(mdo sde): bzhi/ /dmyal bar skyes na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra'o/ /dmyal srungs dang ni dmyal ba'i me mthong nas/ /shin tu skrag dngangs cho nges cher 'debs shing / /rang la rngan 'grang sngon gyi sdig pa la/ /shin tu 'gyod kyang phan pa ci yang med/ /lus 'di shin tu che la
208b5(mdo sde): gzhon sha can/ /tshor ba che zhing drag po'i lus thob nas/ /kha cig rang lus me yi phung por 'bar/ /kha cig lcags mkhar khang pa sbrum mar rdung / /'gre ldog byed cing phyogs ni kun nas sreg /kha cig lcags las byas pa'i snod chen du/ /spyi tshugs 'bru
208b6(mdo sde): nyungs chu khol thug bzhin 'tshed/ /kha cig sog les 'dra zhing gtun la rdung / /kha cig gnas dang khang par srung zhing sreg /me ma mur dang thal tshan chu la sogs/ /sdug bsngal mang po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi yi lo ni 'bum dang brgyad khri la/ /dmyal ba kha
208b7(mdo sde): cig na ni nyin zhag gcig / de la sogs pa bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ /shi bar dga' yang 'chir ni mi btub bo/ /las ma zad pa kha cig 'jig chags tshe/ /'jig rten brgyud cing 'jig chags med par skye/ /skyes pa bkres dang skom pas gdungs/ /mgo
209a1(mdo sde): bo ri tsam kha ni khab mig tsam/ /ske rtsa rab phra gsus pa yul ljongs tsam/ /bza' btung mthong yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang / /rnag khrag ngan skyugs la sogs gzhan du mthong / /kha cig zos kyang khro chu khol mar 'gro/ /byol song skyes na gcig la
209a2(mdo sde): gcig za dang / /rang la dbang med bkol btags rdeg 'tshog dang / /gzhan gyis gsod sogs gti mug rmongs pas sdug /mir skyes na yang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ /ma ni 'grangs tshe brag bar btsir ba 'dra/ /bkres pa'i tshe na spyang la btang ba snyam/ /drag shul
209a3(mdo sde): byed tshe gtun la rdung ba snyam/ /btsas pa'i tshe na pags pa bshus nas ni/ /rtsig pa'i logs la drud pa bas kyang rtsub/ /tsha 'brum bkres skom rkang lag na nas sdug /cher skyes na yang so nam brel phongs dang / /nye du bral dang dgras bcom bu lon dang / /bkres
209a4(mdo sde): skom tsha grang don la sogs pas sdug / phongs pa rnams ni btsal thabs med nas sdug /yod pa rnams kyang 'tsho skyong mel tshes sdug /zhing rmo tshong byed 'du byed las kyi sdug /de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /sdug bsngal gzhi ni phal cher lto rgyab
209a5(mdo sde): gnyis/ /'jig rten 'di yi bde ba'i longs spyod kyang / /phal cher phyi ma'i ngan song sdug bsngal rgyu/ /lha min skyes na nga rgyal phrag dog dang / /khro gtum 'thab rtsod la sogs dbang gis sdug /lhar skyes kyang ni 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang / /'chi ltas lnga dang 'du
209a6(mdo sde): byed dbang gis sdug / rgas pa yang ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /mgo dkar gnyer 'dus gzhan gyis mthong mi mos/ /kha sna chu 'dzag rkang lag kun kyang 'dar/ /sems kyis dran yang lus la nyam stobs med/ /bu tsha kun kyang shi na rung snyam sems/ /zhal ta
209a7(mdo sde): byas kyang mi nyan dbang yang shor/ /kha cig srin rgan shi 'phyis zhes kyang zer/ /kha cig ber dbyug thogs nas rdung bar byed/ /de ltar mthong thos shir 'dod shir ma btub/ /na ba rnams ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /lus kyi 'byung chen bzhi ni ma snyoms pas/ /rlung mkhris bad
209b1(mdo sde): kan 'dus pas lus gdungs te/ /longs spyod mthong yang 'di la 'dod pa med/ /lus kyi nyam stobs shor bas ldang mi nus/ /mdzes pa'i gzi mdangs shor bas 'dra/ /'chi ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /gnyen bshes tshogs kyis cho nge
209b2(mdo sde): 'debs byed kyang / /de la nyan lta bsam pa'i yul med de/ /gnad gcod pa ni mtshon chas gtub pa 'dra/ /mdza' dang mi mdza'i don du sngar byas pa'i/ /dge sdig las ni rmi lam yul bzhin snang / /gshin rje'i pho nya shin tu 'jigs pas bskor/ /bred sha thon nas
209b3(mdo sde): kun tu bltas byas kyang / /mgon skyabs byed pa su yang ma mthong nas/ /shin tu 'jigs bzhin kun tu yi mug ste/ /bdag nyid gar 'gro gtol med bar do 'byung / /mi rtag sdug bsngal mi zad yun ring 'di/ /thog ma med nas da lta'i bar du yang / /'phags lam ma
209b4(mdo sde): thob bar du rtag tu gdung / /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'di shin tu sdug bsngal ba lags na bde legs dang ldan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bde legs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rgyal pos
209b5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ ji ltar bde legs phun sum tshogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bde ba'i mchog /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang nyon mongs med/ /ngan song gsum sogs bkres skom grang dro dang / /skye rga na 'chi la sogs sdug
209b6(mdo sde): bsngal med/ /'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal gtan zad nas/ /las su gzhan don 'ba' zhig spyod byed cing / /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor ba las yid byung nas rgyal srid mchil ma'i
209b7(mdo sde): thal ba ltar bor te/ mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes mchog go/ /me tog rnams kyi nang na pad ma dkar
210a1(mdo sde): po mchog go/ /'du shes thams cad kyi nang na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes mchog go/ /bsam pa rnams kyi nang na 'khor ba las yid byung ba mchog go/ /rgyal po chen po 'khor ba las yid byung ba legs so/ /skyo ba skyes pa legs so/ /chags na 'khor ba
210a2(mdo sde): yin no/ /ma chags na mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying
210a3(mdo sde): po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ rA dza de sha nA
210a4(mdo sde): ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI na 'khor
210a5(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston pa na/ bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas 'khor dang bcas pa bad sa la'i yul du gshegs pa dang / bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed grong khyer chen po gser can zhes bya ba gzhom pa'i phyir dmag bzhi dang chas pa dang phrad
210a6(mdo sde): pas rgyal po 'char byed khros te/ 'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa dang phrad pas bsad par rigs so zhes nas mda' ste'u kha nya rnga ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so/ /de nas mda' de nam mkha' la 'khor zhing 'di skad ces grag go/ /zhe sdang gis ni sdug bsngal
210a7(mdo sde): skyed/ /'dir yang sha thang 'thab dang rtsod/ /phyi mar dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung / /des na zhe sdang 'thab rtsod spang / /zhes bya ba'i tshig de rgyal po 'char byed kyis thos par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mos par gyur te phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
210b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'thab rtsod ni 'dir sha thang la phyi mar ngan song du skye na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'thab rtsod 'ba' zhig byed/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ gauta ma bdag gis gang dang 'thabs kyang pham ma myong ste rgyal bas bdag ni dmag dang 'thab pa la
210b2(mdo sde): mos pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dgra 'di ni dgra chung ngu yin te/ rgyal po chen po 'di ma yin pa'i dgra chen po shar gnyer ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal pos gsol pa dgra de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
210b3(mdo sde): dgra chen po nyon mongs pa bdag tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal pos gsol pa dgra de ji lta bu lags bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra chen po/ /'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du/ /thog ma med nas
210b4(mdo sde): bdag la gnas nas ni/ /bdag gi chos sku yid bzhin rin chen de/ /gzod ma'i mu nas dgra yis brkus nas su/ /mtshan ma'i tshang tshing gseb tu sbas nas bdag /da rung 'ching zhing 'khor bar 'khyam du 'jug /'jig rten dgras ni bsad nas nor 'phrog tsam/ /
210b5(mdo sde): de la bzod byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs/ /dgra 'di zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod/ /de bsten bsod nams 'khor bar 'dam du 'ching / /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dgra chen po de dang ji ltar 'thab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam
210b6(mdo sde): rtog dgra la rgol ba'i shom ra yang / /dad pas sbyin dang tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs te/ /dge ba'i dpung byas bzod pa'i go gyon la/ /brtson 'grus lcag thogs bsam gtan gzhu bdungs te/ /bdag med stong pa'i mda' yis bdag 'dzin bsad/ /rgyal pos
210b7(mdo sde): gsol pa bdag med pa zhes pa de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/ /gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci phyir na/ /rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pas gang nas/ /'bras bu phung por zag ste de yi bdag /
211a1(mdo sde): bdag ni sems can so so'i lus 'di la/ /nga dang bdag tu bzung nas chags gyur te/ /bdag ni na dang shi bkres grang gis dogs/ /bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste/ /de la dmigs nas mu stegs lnga rnams 'jug /nga 'am bdag de yod pa ma yin te/ /
211a2(mdo sde): phung po 'di la brtags nas 'khrul pa yin/ /ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa tsam/ /lus ni bdag ma yin te sha rus rnams/ /'byung chen 'dus pa phyi rol rtsig pa 'dra/ /sems kyang bdag ma yin te dngos po med/ /chos la bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/ /
211a3(mdo sde): chos ni gzugs sogs dngos po thams cad yin/ /byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir ro/ /de dag log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dang / /lta mi 'thun pa yin te de med do/ /ci phyir zhe na phyi nang chos 'di la/ /dngos 'di spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyi/ /snang ba nyid na
211a4(mdo sde): stong pa nyid yin phyir/ /gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong ming gdags/ /snang la rang bzhin med par cis mngon na/ /yod med dbus dang gsum du mi gnas te/ /yod par grags pa 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin yul sems rnam gnyis te/ /yul 'di
211a5(mdo sde): dngos po med par 'di ltar brtag / rang snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas gzhig med/ /dngos snang thams cad sems yin rmi lam bzhin/ /sems kyang kha dog dbyibs sogs rnams dang bral/ /des na 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med do/ /'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang
211a6(mdo sde): med/ /yod pa ma grub pas na med pa'ang med/ /mtha' gnyis med phyir dbus kyang med pa yin/ /de ltar rgyal pos bdag med bsgom byas na/ /bdag 'dzin 'khor ba rtsad nas chod par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ snga gong yan chad dgra ma yin pa la dgrar bzung ste bdag zhe sdang
